text: Hello everyone! Does anybody know how to track HubSpot form submission in GA via GTM? I followed this instruction <https://www.3whitehats.com/knowledge/tracking-HubSpot-forms-google-tag-manager/> , yet the events of form submission don't show in ga. I guess the problem is that I write a variable in a layer field  in a tag (screenshot attached), yet I don't know how to indicate the same variable in GA event.

Hello out there, it's the first time i request some help with HubSpot and i'm not if this is the correct place but i will give a try and hope to get some answers.

I'm no coder and no designer, but i have fun with it :slightly_smiling_face:

This is a screenshot of an html source of a HubSpot module on the category page of the blog. I used some custom hubl variables on the blog detail pages and i want to show them on the overview as well:

dot_date_start
dot_date_end
dot_event_location_adress
dot_event_price

On the blog detailpage i copied the snipped and pasted into the templates. I can show all information with module.(...)
On the overviewpage they should display with row[0], row[1] etc. But i only got the green highlighted. *Correction*: dot_date_start and dot_date_end is not correct. It's the wrong date.

Can anybody give me a little hint?
